short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: STEP 1 is a Al-based WEB 3 user graph that utilizes big data to help users  get the rewards they deserve.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
STEP 1 is a Al-based WEB 3 user graph that utilizes big data to provide a
comprehensive analysis of the user. Its goal is to address the challenges
of identifying scientists and freeloaders efficiently in the WEB 3 market
and to incentivize high-quality user engagement instead through
innovative economic models.
